synopsis.p: lists a set of values and computes aggregate values.

description.p: lists a set of elements specified by , and computes a string value for each specified by . computes aggregates functions specified by for each distinct value. The list of entry keys and their aggregate values are written into

param-doc.name: key
param-doc.p: Value of each entry. This expression is evaluated as a string from the entry element.

param-doc.name: aggregators
param-doc.p: Aggregate functions to compute for each value.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as context element. If the result is false, then the module does not process the module.

param-doc.name: entries
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated from the corpus as a list of elements.

param-doc.name: separator
param-doc.p: Character that separates columns in the result file.

param-doc.name: outFile
param-doc.p: File where to write the result.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
